results.deck: Xbox 360 remake/port of the 2006 spaceflight combat and trading game, DarkStar One, released in summer 2010.
results.name: DarkStar One: Broken Alliance

results.deck: Ben 10 Ultimate Alien: Cosmic Destruction is the latest Ben 10 video game set during the events of Ben 10: Ultimate Alien.
results.name: Ben 10 Ultimate Alien: Cosmic Destruction

results.deck: Action-adventure air combat game set in the MySims universe.
results.name: MySims SkyHeroes

results.deck: Take to the skies in this Clancy-infused flight combat game.
results.name: Tom Clancy's H.A.W.X. 2

results.deck: Monopoly Streets reimagines the classic board game as a dynamic gameworld encountered from street level. As players buy and build up properties, they'll see actual buildings erected, styled in accordance with the neighborhoods' economic status.
results.name: Monopoly Streets

results.deck: Pro Evolution Soccer 2011, also known as Winning Eleven 2011, and usually shortened to PES 2011 or WE 2011, will be the new installment in Konami's strongly followed football (soccer) series. It will be released on September 30th in Europe, and on October 5th in the US.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2011

results.deck: Raging Blast 2 continues the next generation of Budokai Tenkaichi style of Dragon Ball fighting games.
results.name: Dragon Ball: Raging Blast 2

results.deck: A character action game in which the player takes on the role of Enoch, a virtuous mortal from Heaven who, in order to prevent a great flood, ventures to imprison the seven Fallen Angels that turned their back on God.
results.name: El Shaddai: Ascension of the Metatron

results.deck: The title was released on PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and Wii, and features versions of The Game of Life, Clue, Twister, Mouse Trap, and Yahtzee Hands Down. The games is hosted by Mr. Potato Head, and players can use their Mii and Avatar on the Wii and Xbox
results.name: Hasbro Family Game Night 3

results.deck: In Truth or Lies, players join family & friends in roundtable-style gameplay answering an wide array of thought-provoking questions. The game's built-in lie detector will let everyone know if the answers are truthful.
results.name: Truth or Lies

results.deck: A third-person action game in which Heinrich, a scythe wielding soldier, hacks and slashes his way through enemies to protect Gretchen, a witch who has cursed him with immortality.
results.name: Knights Contract

results.deck: EA's renamed basketball simulation set for an October 2010 release was cancelled at the last minute due to concerns over quality. The game was intended to introduce brand new control concepts and mechanics meant to innovate on the simulation basketball genre.
results.name: NBA Elite 11

results.deck: 2K's long-running basketball simulator is back for another season with Michael Jordan as their cover athlete.
results.name: NBA 2K11

results.deck: The sixth installment of the Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell series and follows the events after Splinter Cell: Conviction.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Blacklist

results.deck: A new golf franchise developed by Gusto Games for the PS3, Xbox 360 and PC, this game stars the PGA Legend John Daly and will make use of the Playstation Move.
results.name: John Daly's ProStroke Golf

results.deck: The First Templar is a third-person action adventure title that features cooperative play and an RPG-like character progression system.
results.name: The First Templar

results.deck: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1 is the first of two games developed by EA Bright Light for the book and movie of the same name. Unlike previous Harry Potter titles, this game is more unique with extended features and graphics.
results.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1

results.deck: Tanner returns in this new Driver sequel. Set in San Francisco, the game actually takes place inside his coma stricken brain. This allows him to bend the rules of the road... and reality!
results.name: Driver: San Francisco

results.deck: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2011 is the twelfth installment of the popular wrestling series and introduces a brand new physics system to the gameplay as well as a new WWE Universe mode.
results.name: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2011

results.deck: Legends and current superstars go at it in this over-the-top wrestling game from THQ's San Diego studio.
results.name: WWE All Stars

results.deck: FIFA 11 is the yearly, best selling football (soccer) game by EA Sports. FIFA 11 features 11 v 11 online multiplayer and the ability to play as a goalkeeper.
results.name: FIFA 11

results.deck: Activision & Field Motor Sports team up to bring you the latest game based on the Monster Jam license, Monster Jam 2011. Race 30 licensed trucks, or create your own, in 8 real stadiums.
results.name: Monster Jam: Path of Destruction

results.deck: The World Love Organization is here to raise the Japanese birth rate! Run!
results.name: W.L.O. Sekai Renai Kikousen

results.deck: Criterion's reboot of one of the most popular games in the Need for Speed series. The game features Racer versus Cop gameplay and can be played from either perspective at any time.
results.name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit

results.deck: 505 Games is publishing this M-rated take on Mixed Martial Arts.
results.name: Supremacy MMA

results.deck: Kinectimals is a virtual pet game in which the player can interact with various breeds of wild cats, the player and the animal then embark on a quest to discover the secrets of the island.
results.name: Kinectimals

results.deck: A sports title using Microsoft's Kinect, players can participate in six different games including beach volleyball, boxing, bowling, soccer, table tennis, and assorted track and field events.
results.name: Kinect Sports

results.deck: Kinect Adventures! features a series of gesture-based mini-games using Microsoft's Kinect sensor.
results.name: Kinect Adventures!

results.deck: Made by famed music-game developer Harmonix Music Systems, this is the original dancing rhythm title that utilized the Kinect for Xbox 360.
results.name: Dance Central

results.deck: Your Shape Fitness Evolved is a fitness game by Ubisoft for Xbox 360 which utilizes Kinect.
results.name: Your Shape Fitness Evolved

results.deck: Star Wars-themed minigame collection for the Xbox Kinect system that features a Jedi killing several storm troopers, and finally facing off against Darth Vader. A video of possible gameplay was first shown at E3 2010.
results.name: Kinect Star Wars

results.deck: Q Entertainment's music shooter for Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. It features support for the Kinect and Move controllers, and is considered a spiritual successor to the cult classic, Rez.
results.name: Child of Eden

results.deck: A Kinect-based racing game for the Xbox 360 featuring characters from the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise.
results.name: Sonic Free Riders

results.deck: A Kinect-exclusive minigame collection that launched with the motion-sensing device.
results.name: Motion Sports

results.deck: Officially revealed at Ubisoft's 2010 E3 press briefing, Rayman Origins is a new 2D Rayman game developed by Michel Ancel and a small team, taking the series back to its roots.
results.name: Rayman Origins

results.deck: As a benevolent god known as 'the Breath', players must lead their people to safety and help them retrieve the lost knowledge of their ancestors by manipulating the shape of the terrain of the world in this spiritual successor to Populous.
results.name: From Dust

results.deck: Find out who's bad in this Ubisoft game based on the life of Michael Jackson.
results.name: Michael Jackson: The Experience

results.deck: Resident Evil: Revelations is a full, story-driven Resident Evil title for the Nintendo 3DS, in which Chris Redfield and Jill Valentine split up to investigate a new conspiracy, with new partners Parker and Jessica.
results.name: Resident Evil: Revelations

results.deck: Zumba Fitness is a fitness game that blends with a dance game to give you a proper workout. It is compatible with both the Kinect and the PlayStation Move.
results.name: Zumba Fitness

results.deck: Developed by Feelplus and published by SquareEnix, assume the role of a "Wanderer" controlling the minds of enemies to turn the tide of battle.
results.name: Mindjack

results.deck: Adrenalin Misfits is Konami's first ever Microsoft Kinect title.
results.name: Adrenalin Misfits

results.deck: The first Otomedius game to come to the United States, exclusively to the Xbox 360. Otomedius has been described as Gradius with anime girls.
results.name: Otomedius Excellent

results.deck: A dancing game for the Xbox 360's Kinect sensor by the creators of Dance Dance Revolution.
results.name: DanceMasters

results.deck: The first of the Deca Sports series to appear on the Xbox with the use of the Kinect Sensor. It includes Paintball which is the first shooter (First or Third Person) to use Kinect Controls.
results.name: Deca Sports Freedom

results.deck: In this brutal action game from the creators of Alien vs. Predator, players become Bryce Boltsman, a demon hunter cursed with immortality five hundred years ago, who can survive being violently dismembered by his enemies as long as his head isn't swallowed whole.
results.name: NeverDead

results.deck: A revival of the classic trivia party game series.
results.name: You Don't Know Jack

results.deck: A karaoke-type game that uses the Kinect for the Xbox 360 and the PlayStation Eye for the PlayStation 3 to replace actors from television shows & movies with players, who then act and recite the lines to "put themselves in the movie."
results.name: Yoostar 2: In The Movies

results.deck: The spiritual sequel to the classic Battle Chess, Check vs. Mate is based upon ChessBase's Fritz! chess algorithm software.
results.name: Check vs. Mate

results.deck: THQ is developing a game based off of the Shrek character, Puss in Boots. This will be released for the Wii, DS, PS3 and 360.
results.name: Puss in Boots

results.deck: Strategy game set in feudal Japan, reimagined with anime girls.
results.name: Sengoku Hime 2: Senran no Yo, Gunyuu Arashi no Gotoku

results.deck: Black Bean and Milestone combine to create a brand new contender for the top rally title, bearing the official FIA and WRC branding.
results.name: WRC: FIA World Rally Championship

results.deck: "THE iDOLM@STER 2", the sequel to the popular "iDOLM@STER" series ("THE iDOLM@STER", "Live For You!"). A simulation game where the player takes on the role of an idol manager and raises their idols to stardom.
results.name: THE iDOLM@STER 2

results.deck: Play as you're favorite teams from the NRL, Super League, State of Origin, City v Country, and World Cup.
results.name: Rugby League Live

results.deck: A new helicopter flight sim developed by Gaijin Entertainment and published by Activision.
results.name: Apache: Air Assault

results.deck: James Bond 007: Blood Stone is a third-person shooter developed by Bizarre Creations.
results.name: James Bond 007: Blood Stone

results.deck: EA brings Fight Night back into the ring with an M-rating, depicting the "violence and brutality that is true to the trade."
results.name: Fight Night Champion

results.deck: CROSSCHANNEL is a Japanese visual novel about people who cannot fit into society.
results.name: CROSSCHANNEL

results.deck: A racing game being developed by Activision, release date 11.16.2010.
results.name: Death Drive

results.deck: The tie-in videogame to the 2011 Green Lantern movie. This brawler depicts a clash between the Green Lantern Corps. and their predecessors as guardians of the universe, evil robots known as the Manhunters.
results.name: Green Lantern: Rise of the Manhunters

results.deck: The two leaders in the fighting game genre collide in this ultimate tag-team mash-up. Will you cross the line?
results.name: Street Fighter X Tekken

results.deck: Tekken X Street Fighter is/was one of the two crossover fighting games featuring notable Street Fighter and Tekken characters. This upcoming Namco-developed entry will utilize a 3D playing field featured in the Tekken franchise. Development has been troubled since its announcement.
results.name: Tekken X Street Fighter

results.deck: PopCap's second disc of their arcade hits. Includes Peggle, Feeding Frenzy 2, and Heavy Weapon.
results.name: PopCap Arcade Vol. 2

results.deck: The Super Hero Squad team up to stop the evil Dr. Doom from retrieving all of the Infinity Stones. Coming to Wii, DS, PS3 and Xbox 360 from THQ.
results.name: Marvel Super Hero Squad: The Infinity Gauntlet

results.deck: Based on the novel and movie of the same name, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 will provide a conclusion to the series as it is not only the second and last Deathly Hallows game, but also the last main Harry Potter game.
results.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

results.deck: A game centered around user-based design and creation, crafted by EA Bright Light.
results.name: Create

results.deck: The third game in the Operation Flashpoint series. Operation FlashPoint: Red River will focus on co-op gameplay.
results.name: Operation Flashpoint: Red River

results.deck: The sequel to the 2009 racer Need for Speed: Shift. Shift 2 features improved graphics, a new campaign mode and the addition of the Autolog system as featured in Need For Speed: Hot Pursuit.
results.name: SHIFT 2: Unleashed

results.deck: This Xbox 360 update to the PS3 release of Agarest Senki Zero features additional content.
results.name: Agarest Senki Zero: Dawn of War

results.deck: The latest console iteration of the Ace Combat franchise, and a reboot of the series, Assault Horizon adds flyable helicopters, destructible environments, and a new cinematic pursuit system called "Close Range Assault".
results.name: Ace Combat Assault Horizon

results.deck: A new arcade racer from the developers at Candella Software.
results.name: Cargasm

results.deck: Cabela's North American Adventures gives players the opportunity to experience hunting in more than 20 locations across the continent.
results.name: Cabela's North American Adventures

results.deck: Featuring full motion controls, players will be able to cast, reel, jig, set the hook and more as if they had an actual fishing rod in their hands.
results.name: Rapala Pro Bass Fishing

results.deck: The third game in the BioShock series leaves the bottom of the sea behind for an entirely new setting - the floating city of Columbia, circa 1912. Come to retrieve a girl named Elizabeth, ex-detective Booker DeWitt finds more in store for him there than he could ever imagine.
results.name: BioShock Infinite

results.deck: Tropico 4 sees you return as El Presidente, the tyrannical (or benevolent) dictator of the island paradise of Tropico. The game challenges you to build an island empire while dealing with other world powers as you work to build up your Swiss bank account.
results.name: Tropico 4

results.deck: The planned sequel to S.T.A.L.K.E.R. The game would have used a new multi-platform engine. It was officially cancelled on April 25th, 2012.
results.name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2

results.deck: DoDonPachi Resurrection is a bullet hell shoot 'em up developed by Cave, and the followup to DoDonPachi DaiOuJou.
results.name: DoDonPachi Resurrection

results.deck: Gun Loco was an Xbox 360-exclusive shooter in development at Square Enix Europe which has been canceled.
results.name: Gun Loco

results.deck: The first game developed by Atlus for the PS3/Xbox 360. Made by the Persona Team, The game is an "adult oriented" action-adventure/horror game with puzzle platforming stages.
results.name: Catherine

results.deck: The latest game in Sega's Virtua Tennis series adds a new World Tour, online rank progression, and optional motion play.
results.name: Virtua Tennis 4

results.deck: Fighters Uncaged is a Kinect fighting game, using the player's body to trigger various martial arts attacks. Fight twelve different opponents in a brutal underground tournament.
results.name: Fighters Uncaged

results.deck: This is based on DreamWorks Animation's film Megamind.
results.name: Megamind: Ultimate Showdown

results.deck: Get Fit With Mel B includes six types of aerobics disciplines with more than 100 tailored exercises.
results.name: Get Fit With Mel B

results.deck: It is the seventh title in the Memories Off visual novel series.
results.name: Memories Off: Yubikiri no Kioku

results.deck: Demons of Mercy is based on the comic book of the same name, starring Mercy Dawn as an assassin who must save the world from apocalypse.
results.name: Demons of Mercy

results.deck: Possession is a survival horror game inspired by classic zombie movies. You play as the "Enslaver," a former-human who can take command of all zombies.
results.name: Possession

results.deck: Track down the re-incarnated souls of history's most evil people in your capacity as an agent for a shadowy organization of dubious intent.
results.name: Incarnate

results.deck: For the first time in Synetic's Crash Time series, players can experience and partake in challenges online. Crash Time returns with a host of new features in "Crash Time 4: The Syndicate".
results.name: Crash Time 4: The Syndicate

results.deck: Take control of big game hunter Cole Rainsford and bag some possessed murderous animals, in this 2010 installment of the first-person hunting series.
results.name: Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2011

results.deck: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Defenders of the Core brings gamers into a fast binding action adventure to save the Earth and New Vestroia from Zenoheld, Spectra and their Vexos minions.
results.name: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Defenders of the Core

results.deck: The gem of American military superiority in Vietnam was the strategic Marine Corps base a Khe Sanh. Located a few miles from the borders of North Vietnam and Laos, Khe Sanh was heavily fortified in late '67 by Gen. William Westmoreland,
results.name: The Siege of Khe Sanh

results.deck: Data-Fly Sci-Fi adventure stealth game that puts the player in the role of an AI named FLY who is on a mission to rescue her creator.
results.name: Data-Fly

results.deck: Outland is a 2D platformer with an emphasis on either light or dark forms to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies. The game bears a unique visual style and "Out of this World"-style platforming gameplay.
results.name: Outland

results.deck: An action adventure game that involves solving puzzles, managing resources, claiming territories, and battling angry monsters.
results.name: Troll & Armor

results.deck: Play as a hero in a party of three as you adventure through different regions and face different foes.
results.name: Fairy Tales: Three Heroes

results.deck: Hellion: Mystery of the Inquisition is a first person shoot set in the 13th century.
results.name: Hellion: Mystery of the Inquisition

results.deck: Insect Armageddon is the fourth installment of D3's line of budget-priced shooters featuring online and local co-op modes, and a new Swarm survival mode.
results.name: Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon

results.deck: Ghetto Golf combines golfing with machine guns. Your skills quickly grow as you bounce golf balls off of buildings and homeless people.
results.name: Ghetto Golf

results.deck: The fourth entry in 2K Sports' Top Spin series released in March 2011. This edition brings new features such as PlayStation Move & 3D support.
results.name: Top Spin 4
